who.title: Who Are We?
who.p1: Rentaleazy is a team of professionals trained in hospitality, expert in reservations management, positioning on multiple platforms, and customer care.
who.p2: We offer all types of services and comprehensive management for your property.
who.p3: With the aim of getting the most out of your rental property, get a higher price optimization and increase your income.
who.p4: We focus on obtaining the maximum profitability of your rental property, without having to worry about anything.

why.title: Why Rentaleazy?
why.p1: We are pioneers with a long track record in the industry of rental cheap, short-and long-term
why.p2: We have multi-lingual staff are highly trained, passionate for good service, customer care and the friendly treatment.
why.p3: We have multi-lingual staff are highly trained, passionate for good service, customer care and the friendly treatment.
why.p4: Our commitment is to offer an optimal experience, translated into profitability and growth.
why.p5: With Rentaleazy you will have the peace of mind that your property is in good hands and your guests are well taken care of. Increase your income without having to worry about anything.

alquiler.tab-title: Rentals of medium and long duration | Rentaleazy
alquiler.title: Rental of medium and long duration
alquiler.text1: We take care of the complete management of rentals short and long stay, as well as student flats. You'll get higher income and more flexibility than a long term rental.

text2.p1: We have two types of rent for your rental apartment medium and long stay.
items: Rent per room: We rent the rooms individually.
Rental of entire floor: We rent the full floor tenant.
text2.p2: We manage the accommodation of young professionals and university students of bachelor, master and doctorate as well as working people.
text2.p3: We select those profiles that match your desires: Men, women, Spaniards or International, masters students, young professionals, etc
text2.p4: You'll get higher income and more flexibility than a long term rental
text2.p5: Save time and be free of worries knowing that your floor is in the best condition, and generating the most revenue possible.

text3.p1: We offer the most complete service to ensure the success of the rental of your apartment.

items.title: Management of bookings and announcements
items.text: Guarantee of the highest occupancy we have a great visibility on the main platforms of advertising.

items.title: Interior design
items.text: We advise you on the interior decoration, to take your floor with the latest trends in decoration and so get the most out of your rental

items.title: Furniture
items.text: Amoblamos the floor according to the profile of tenants you want to lease the housing, adapting ourselves to your budget

items.title: Cleaning service
items.text: We clean your apartment for a day, week or fortnight. Adapting to your needs

items.title: We manage the expenses of the floor
items.text: Electricity, gas, water, internet etc, We follow up the payment of the rent and the bills by the tenant. By means of vouchers.

items.title: Maintenance service
items.text: Repair any kind of damage (paint, plumbing, electricity etc..)

text.p1: We have photographers specializing in photography of interiors and architecture, so that your floor will stand out from the crowd with professional images and high-quality.
text.p2: We have photographers specializing in photography of interiors and architecture, so that your floor will stand out from the crowd with professional images and high-quality.

bath.tab-title: Service of bed linen and bath | Rentaleazy
bath.title: Bed linen and bath
bath.subtitle: If you need bed linen and towels for your apartment cheap, Rentaleazy provides you with everything you need. To meet your needs and offer your guests the utmost in comfort.
cost: Our bed sheets and towels are used in hotels 5 stars

maintenance.title: Maintenance overhaul
maintenance.subtitle: We offer you a service of full maintenance, which ranges from the repair and overhaul of any type of malfunction, until the comprehensive reform or part of the housing.
cost: Price depending on the particular service

clean.title: Cleaning service
clean.subtitle: We have "professional service" of cleaning and laundry, attending to every detail, so that your apartment is always in optimal condition and that the guests feel at casaa.
items: Deep cleaning of kitchen and appliances*
Sweeping, vacuuming and mopping of floors
cost: Housing of greater dimension: +7,50€ per room
clean.text: All cleaning products will be provided by the owner.
